properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova vimocincina vare patalu paducu siyonunaku tirigi vatturu nityanandamu kaligina varai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvaina yasu bhulokamuna maharajai elaga raga Nityanandamuto vijayasucanato manassuna duá¸¥khamu nitturpunu leka{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aranyamunu endina bhumiyu viriyabuyu nullasamuto Ghanadai yehova mahimanu gancu prabhukristuni prabhavamunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gruddiki kannulu cevitiki cevulu kuntini gentedi duppiga jeya Sundarudaina rajun dendamuna ganci mugavani naluka padi harsimpa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Payaninturu varu raja margamuna apavitrulu pojalaranduna Undadaccota e marga rajunu parisuddha darilo paramagitamuto{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhayapadavaladani abhayambicci varini raksimpa vegameraga Pratidandana jeyu prabhuvunu juci diguluto janulu vanakucunda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nityamu dahincu agnijvalalalo nundagajalinavaru evaru Vesadarulaku bitiganunda papiga nundina nilutuveccata{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nitini buni yadardhamuga vidina papalabhamunu Nityamu nilucu siyonu puriki mudamuna jeri stutintuvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unnata parvata silale vaniki balamaina mahakotaga kaga Koduvenundadu tana aharamunu panamunaku halleluya{/lang-eng}
